name.ja_JP: ファクションアドバンスカップ<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

info.en_US: Refight several midgame battles found during your quests for the factions!
info.pt_BR: Reviva várias batalhas orridas durante suas missões para as facções!
info.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals die späteren Bosse aus den Quests der Fraktionen!
info.zh_CN: 再次对抗几个中期派系任务！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.zh_TW: 再次對抗幾個中期派系任務！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ja_JP: ゲーム中盤のファクションクエストで出会った敵ともう一度戦おう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ko_KR: 중기 세력 퀘스트 진행 중 싸웠던 몬스터들과 다시 싸우세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

core.condition: quest.fd-2-meerkat-cave.solved && quest.rhg-2-crate_smuggle.solved && quest.rftc-3-metalstuff.solved && quest.miners-1-dirtbunnies.solved && quest.bg-2-goat_cave_1.solved && quest.nomadAdv-3-sandman_tomb_1.solved && quest.bakiGuard-2-evil_guard.solved && quest.jungleTrader-2-snowman_thief_2.solved && quest.jungleGreens-2-plantSearch_1.solved

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Don't let them \c[3]regenerate over the flames\c[0]!

Derrote os \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0] no \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Não deixe eles se \c[3]regenerarem com as chamas\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege die \c[3]Rasegeier\c[0] im \c[3]Maronental\c[0]!
Verhindere ihre \c[3]Regenation über den Flammen\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0]!
不要让它们在\c[3]火中做自己\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]炎の上で回復\c[0]させないようにしよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
擊敗\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0]!
不要讓它們在\c[3]火中做自己\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Have another duel with \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0], Ba'kii Kum's most treasonous guard!
And also trash his \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]s\c[0] while you're at it!
objective.pt_BR:
Tenha outro duelo com \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0], o guarda mais traiçoeiro de Ba'kii Kum!
E também destrua as \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]s\c[0] dele!
objective.de_DE:
Liefere dir ein weiteres Duell mit der \c[3]Wache Billston\c[0], Ba'kii Kums Hochverräter!
Und wirf auch gleich seine \c[3]Legionsgeschütze v2\c[0] auf den Müll, wenn du schon mal dabei bist!
objective.zh_CN:
再次与巴基库姆最险恶的守卫\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]决斗!
记得顺带消灭掉他的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
再次與巴基庫姆最險惡的守衛\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]決鬥!
記得順帶消滅掉他的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
バキーイ・クムの裏切者、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]ともう一度戦い倒せ！
\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]もついでに壊そう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
바키쿰의 가장 불성실한 경비원인 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]과 다시 결투하세요!
그리고 그의 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]도 부수세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:

Try to keep its \c[3]heat\c[0] in a \c[3]balanced state\c[0]!

Besiege den mächtigen metallischen \c[3]Schmelz-Digmo\c[0] in der \c[3]Tempelmine\c[0]!
Versuche seine \c[3]Hitze im Gleichgewicht zu halten\c[0]!

在\c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]擊敗強大的\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/mine-diggingbot-quest]\c[0]!

objective.en_US:

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/snowman-jungle-boss]\c[0] who has resettled to \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]!
